headline.main: FRANCE'S REVENUES FRACTION OF COSTS; Unbalanced Budget First Clue to Specific Effect of War on Nation's Finances NAZI ARMY SERIOUS DRAG Public Borrowing Only Means to Raise 60 Per Cent of Necessary Funds

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, July 1 -- France's budget figures for 1941, published today, not only give the first perspective on the government expenditures for the whole year 1940, and the first half of 1941, but provide indications never before published on the effects of the war on French national finances.
